name: Original1
overview:
Original1 is the leading SaaS platform for brand protection and product information for enterprises and consumers. Original1 On-Demand offers a complete set of on-demand services available worldwide for product serialization, Track & Trace and authentication.

The solution supports various devices and is authentication technology agnostic. Original1 On-Demand customers can easily engage their business partners using the service and provide contextually relevant product information for professional users and consumers to prevent illicit business. Original1 On-Demand creates transparency throughout the whole value chain, protects the value of the original brand, and strengthens customer loyalty.

Original1 is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany with a subsidiary in Beijing, China. Original1 GmbH was founded in 2010 as a joint venture between SAP, Nokia and Giesecke & Devrient.
